vars.processors:
- dissect:
    tokenizer: "/nsm/import/%{import.id}/evtx/%{import.file}"
    field: "log.file.path"
    target_prefix: ""
- decode_json_fields:
    fields: ["message"]
    target: ""
- drop_fields:
    fields: ["host"]
    ignore_missing: true
- add_fields:
    target: data_stream
    fields:
      type: logs
      dataset: system.security
- add_fields:
    target: event
    fields:
      dataset: system.security
      module: system
      imported: true
- add_fields:
    target: "@metadata"
    fields:
        pipeline: logs-system.security-1.59.0
- if:
    equals:
      winlog.channel: 'Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational'
  then: 
    - add_fields:
        target: data_stream
        fields:
          dataset: windows.sysmon_operational
    - add_fields:
        target: event
        fields:
          dataset: windows.sysmon_operational
          module: windows
          imported: true
    - add_fields:
        target: "@metadata"
        fields:
            pipeline: logs-windows.sysmon_operational-1.45.1
- if:
    equals:
      winlog.channel: 'Application'
  then: 
    - add_fields:
        target: data_stream
        fields:
          dataset: system.application
    - add_fields:
        target: event
        fields:
          dataset: system.application
    - add_fields:
        target: "@metadata"
        fields:
            pipeline: logs-system.application-1.59.0
- if:
    equals:
      winlog.channel: 'System'
  then: 
    - add_fields:
        target: data_stream
        fields:
          dataset: system.system
    - add_fields:
        target: event
        fields:
          dataset: system.system
    - add_fields:
        target: "@metadata"
        fields:
            pipeline: logs-system.system-1.59.0
    
- if:
    equals:
      winlog.channel: 'Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational'
  then: 
    - add_fields:
        target: data_stream
        fields:
          dataset: windows.powershell_operational
    - add_fields:
        target: event
        fields:
          dataset: windows.powershell_operational
          module: windows
    - add_fields:
        target: "@metadata"
        fields:
            pipeline: logs-windows.powershell_operational-1.45.1
- add_fields:
    target: data_stream
    fields:
        dataset: import
